#TEXT ID: #Note: The # character at the beginning of a row is used to indicate a row header or comment. These rows will not be imported in the game.

ENGLISH: I'm back! Did you miss me?

FRENCH: Balaye du doigt pour changer de voie
Balaye du doigt vers le haut pour sauter
Balaye du doigt pour prendre un virage à 90 degrés
Balaye du doigt vers le bas pour glisser

ENGLISH: You can also tilt to change lanes and collect stars
FRENCH: Tu peux aussi incliner l'appareil pour changer de voie et récupérer des étoiles

ENGLISH: Double tap anywhere to activate selected power
FRENCH: Tape deux fois sur l'écran pour activer le pouvoir sélectionné

ENGLISH: Swipe and release each time instead of holding down your finger.
FRENCH: Balaye et relâche chaque fois au lieu de garder ton doigt sur l'écran.

ENGLISH: Swipe up to jump over obstacles.
FRENCH: Balaye du doigt vers le haut pour sauter par dessus les obstacles.

ENGLISH: Timing is everything. Swipe sideways to turn corners.
FRENCH: Balaye du doigt au bon moment pour prendre un virage à 90 degrés.

ENGLISH: Swipe down to slide under obstacles.
FRENCH: Balaye du doigt vers le bas pour glisser sous les obstacles.

ENGLISH: Slide into breakable objects to avoid stumbling!
FRENCH: Glisse pour briser des objets et ainsi éviter de trébucher!

ENGLISH: You know<comma> you have great cardio!
FRENCH: Tu as vraiment un super cardio !

ENGLISH: This place gives me the creeps.
FRENCH: Cet endroit me flanque la trouille.

ENGLISH: By the White Tree! The dragon burned down the King's bridge. Luckily<comma> I can cast spells.
FRENCH: Par l'Arbre Blanc ! Le dragon a brûlé le pont royal! Heureusement<comma> je sais jeter des sortilèges.

ENGLISH: Hurry! I can hear the troll.
Wood elves used to live here<comma> but they left after the Great Battle.
FRENCH: Les elfes des bois habitaient cette forêt avant<comma> mais hélas<comma> ils ont quitté après la Grande Bataille.

ENGLISH: Goblins have been spotted looting the place. Be careful!
FRENCH: Des gobelins ont été vu en train de piller l'endroit. Fais attention !

ENGLISH: I'm impressed! You manage to survive all those brain-eating zombies!
FRENCH: Wow! Je suis impressionnée. Tu as réussi à survivre à tous ces zombies.

ENGLISH: Oh no! It's the Dark Queen ...
FRENCH: Oh non ! C'est la Sorcière des Ténèbres

ENGLISH: You should never keep your Queen waiting
FRENCH: Tu ne devrais jamais faire attendre ta Reine

ENGLISH: Rise Sister<comma> rise from the deep ...
FRENCH: Soeur<comma> réveille-toi et sort des profondeurs ...

ENGLISH: You're starting to annoy me<comma> Hero.

FRENCH: Personne ne te trouves sympa<comma> tu sais.

ENGLISH: Zombies<comma> get my grimoire back from this thief!
FRENCH: Zombies<comma> ramenez-moi mon grimoire pris par ce voleur !

ENGLISH: The maleficent Dark Queen lives in the wizard tower. This is where she broods and plots nefarious ways to conquer the Kingdom of Lum.
FRENCH: La maléfique Sorcière des Ténèbres habite dans la tour de sorcellerie. C'est là qu'elle manigance ses plans machiavéliques afin de conquérir le Royaume de Lum.

ENGLISH: Tanglewood is a peaceful area located near the Oakvale harbor.
FRENCH: Tanglewood est un endroit paisible situé prêt du havre d'Oakvale.

ENGLISH: The wood elves used to live in Ellenmïrre. They abandoned the city after the Great Battle.
FRENCH: Les elfes des bois habitaient jadis à Ellenmïrre. Ils ont abandonné l'endroit après la Grande Bataille.

ENGLISH: Dreadknot is a vast and ancient cemetery that was built after the Great Battle. It has long since been abandoned and now wicked creatures prowl the land in search of easy prey.
FRENCH: Dreadknot est un vaste et ancien cimetière qui a été construit après la Grande Bataille. Il a été abandonné depuis fort longtemps et maintenant des créatures maléfiques le parcours à la recherche de proies faciles.

ENGLISH: Congratulations hero! You have saved the World of Lum.
FRENCH: Bravo héros ! Tu as sauvé le monde de Lum.

ENGLISH: Super! You have just received <quantity> <powerup name> power-ups!
FRENCH: Génial ! Tu viens de recevoir <quantity> <powerup name> power-ups!

ENGLISH: Awesome. You received <quantity> mystery chest keys
FRENCH: Super! Tu as reçu <quantity> clés pour les coffres mystères

ENGLISH: Cool. You have just received <quantity> lives!
Cool. You have received a special gift!
FRENCH: Génial! Tu as reçu un cadeau spécial !

ENGLISH: You need a key to open the chest. You can get some in the shop
FRENCH: Tu as besoin d'une clé pour ouvrir le coffre. Tu peux t'en procurer dans le magasin.

ENGLISH: Bingo night is in old torture room!
FRENCH: Soirée Bingo dans l'ancienne salle de torture !
Brunch de bienvenue dans la salle 666
Un bienvenue spécial aux vendeurs d'armes
Tu te diriges vers la forêt de Tanglewood.

ENGLISH: You're heading to the tree-city of Ellenmïrre.
FRENCH: Tu te diriges vers la ville dans les arbres de Ellenmïrre.

ENGLISH: You're heading to the Cemetery of Dreadknot. Foul creatures live there...
FRENCH: Tu te diriges vers le cimetière de Dreadknot. Des créatures sinistres y habitent...

ENGLISH: You are almost there! You need to throw the Book of Pure Evil into the Volcano of Doom.
FRENCH: Tu y es presque! Tu dois jeter le Livre Maudit dans le Volcan du Désespoir.

ENGLISH: Congratulations! You have finished the demo.
FRENCH: Bravo ! Tu as finis la démo.

ENGLISH: The range of the Z-Nuke is increased by <range> meters
FRENCH: La portée du Z-Nuke est augmentée de <range> mètres

ENGLISH: The Slow Time powerup lasts <time> seconds longer
FRENCH: Le Ralentisseur de Temps dure <time> secondes de plus

ENGLISH: The Star Magnet powerup lasts <time> seconds longer
FRENCH: L'Aimant à Étoiles dure <time> secondes de plus

ENGLISH: The Shield powerup lasts <time> seconds longer
FRENCH: Le Bouclier dure <time> secondes de plus

ENGLISH: While running<comma> double-tap to activate selected power-up.
FRENCH: Pendant que tu cours<comma> tape deux fois sur l'écran pour activer le power-up sélectionné.

ENGLISH: This will restore your in-app purchases<comma> such as the Star Doubler. Consumable purchases cannot be restored.
FRENCH: Ceci rétablira vos achats intégrés tel que le double-étoiles. Notez que les consommables ne seront pas rétablis.

ENGLISH: Successfully connected to Facebook! All progress is now synchronized with your account.
FRENCH: Connexion à Facebook réussie ! Votre progrès est maintenant synchronisé avec votre compte.

ENGLISH: No Internet connection was found. Please try again later.
FRENCH: Incapable d'établir une connexion Internet. Veuillez essayer plus tard.
Connexion à Facebook annulée par l'usager.

ENGLISH: An error occurred while trying to connect to Facebook. Try again later.
FRENCH: Une erreur est survenue lors de la connexion à Facebook. Veuillez essayer plus tard.

ENGLISH: Play with your friends and receive free gifts!
FRENCH: Jouez avec vos amis et recevez des cadeaux !

ENGLISH: You're not going to let the world be saved by a guy? Come on! Girls are way better at this kind of thing.
FRENCH: Tu ne vas quand même pas laisser un gars sauver le monde? Cela prends un fille pour ce genre de chose.

ENGLISH: You're not going to let the world be saved by a girl? Come on! Guys are way better at this kind of thing.
FRENCH: Tu ne vas quand même pas laisser une fille sauver le monde? Cela prends un gars pour ce genre de chose.

ENGLISH:
<color=#ffa500ff>Gender:</color> Female
<color=#ffa500ff>Race:</color> Fairy
<color=#ffa500ff>Age:</color> 18
<color=#ffa500ff>Date of birth:</color> March 19th
<color=#ffa500ff>Place of Birth:</color> Forest of Elvenhorn
<color=#ffa500ff>Favorite things:</color> Violet flowers
<color=#ffa500ff>Fun Fact:</color> Lily might be small<comma> but she can pack a punch with her spells. She also makes the best oatmeal cookies this side of the WillowBrook River.
FRENCH:
<color=#ffa500ff>Gender:</color> Female
<color=#ffa500ff>Race:</color> Fairy

<color=#ffa500ff>Favorite things:</color> Violet flowers
<color=#ffa500ff>Fun Fact:</color> Lily almost did not graduate from fairy school because she kept forgetting her spells.

ENGLISH:
<color=#ffa500ff>Gender:</color> Female
<color=#ffa500ff>Race:</color> Human
<color=#ffa500ff>Age:</color> 167
<color=#ffa500ff>Date of birth:</color> December 9th
<color=#ffa500ff>Place of Birth:</color> High Peak Castle
<color=#ffa500ff>Favorite things:</color> Skulls of her crushed enemies and the little biscuits they serve during high tea
<color=#ffa500ff>Fun Fact:</color> Lorelei<comma> aka The Dark Queen<comma> is the source of all evil. You miss your carriage and end up late for work? Her fault. You drop your toast and it lands peanut butter side? Her fault again. Her appetite for power is all consuming. She will not stop until all creatures big and small bow to her malificence.
FRENCH:
<color=#ffa500ff>Gender:</color> Female
<color=#ffa500ff>Race:</color> Human
<color=#ffa500ff>Age:</color> 167
<color=#ffa500ff>Date of birth:</color> December 9th
<color=#ffa500ff>Place of Birth:</color> High Peak Castle
<color=#ffa500ff>Favorite things:</color> Crows and skulls
<color=#ffa500ff>Fun Fact:</color> Lorelei<comma> aka The Dark Queen<comma> is the source of all evil. You miss your carriage and end up late for work? Her fault. You drop your toast and it lands peanut butter side? Her fault again. Her appetite for power is all consuming. She will not stop until all creatures big and small bow to her malificence.

ENGLISH:
<color=#ffa500ff>Gender:</color> Male
<color=#ffa500ff>Race:</color> Troll
<color=#ffa500ff>Age:</color> 29
<color=#ffa500ff>Date of birth:</color> November 12th
<color=#ffa500ff>Place of Birth:</color> Western Swamps
<color=#ffa500ff>Favorite things:</color> Squirrels and books
<color=#ffa500ff>Fun Fact:</color> Krock was bullied as a little troll because<comma> unlike his companions<comma> he read books in the bog behind his home. He's the only troll in the Kingdom of Lum who knows how to read. Strangely<comma> since he bought his spiked club at the little weapon's shop at Finnegan's market<comma> no one bothers him anymore.

Strangely<comma> since he bought his spiked club at the little weapon's shop at Finnegan's market<comma> no one has commented on his book reading.

ENGLISH:
<color=#ffa500ff>Favorite hang out:</color> Cemeteries and old battlefields
<color=#ffa500ff>Tips:</color> You can knock down a standing zombie by sliding into it. You can also use a <color=#19538E>Z-Nuke</color> power-up to knock down a whole bunch at once. You get 20 stars for each zombie toppled. You can't knock down a crawling zombie.
<color=#ffa500ff>Favorite things:</color> Brains
<color=#ffa500ff>Fun Fact:</color> Many have speculated on the origin of zombies. Some say<comma> that they are the result of an experiment gone horribly wrong performed by the evil wizard Zotaar. Others suspect that people who eat too much gluten turn into zombies. It's hard to tell who is telling the truth.

ENGLISH: Here's a life! Have a great day!
FRENCH: Voici une vie ! Passe une belle journée !

ENGLISH: I will help you unlock the next episode!
FRENCH: Je vais t'aider à déverrouiller le prochain épisode !

ENGLISH: Purchase instant access to the next exciting episode.
FRENCH: Achète instantanément l'accès au prochain épisode excitant.

ENGLISH: Help me unlock the next episode!
FRENCH: Aide moi à débloquer le prochain épisode !

ENGLISH: Help your friends by sending lives!
FRENCH: Aidez vos amis en leur envoyant des vies supplémentaires !

ENGLISH: Unlock more levels by asking your friends on Facebook for help.
FRENCH: Déverrouiller le prochain épisode en demandant de l'aide à vos amis Facebook.

ENGLISH: Get more lives by asking your friends on Facebook for help.
FRENCH: Obtenez davantage de vies en demandant de l'aide à vos amis Facebook.

FRENCH: vous a aidé à déverrouiller le prochain épisode !
